description:
This was my first internship/co-op position I took.
Website Developer:
  • Maintained and developed new content and features on a WordPress powered website.
  • Integrated MotionPay into the payment system for the Chinese domain which allowed customers to pay with Alipay and WeChat Pay.
Mobile Application Developer:
  • Solo development on an Android eBook reader titled 'One Story a Day'.
  • Connects with a website of the same name.
